query: 'SELECT Business_Unit_ID, Business_Unit, Block_ID, Area_Classification_1, Area_Classification_2, 
       Plant_ID, Plant_ID2, Asset_Owner, Cost_Center, Tier_Classification, Comments, 
       Business_Justification, Attachments, Status, Field_Engineer, Field_Engineer_Remarks, 
       Approver_1_Name, Approver_1_Remarks, Approver_1_Timestamp, Approver_2_Name, 
       Approver_2_Remarks, Approver_2_Timestamp, Created_By, Created_Timestamp, 
       Updated_By, Updated_Timestamp,
       CHECKSUM(Business_Unit_ID, Business_Unit, Block_ID, Area_Classification_1, Area_Classification_2, 
                Plant_ID, Plant_ID2, Asset_Owner, Cost_Center, Tier_Classification, Comments, 
                Business_Justification, Attachments, Status, Field_Engineer, Field_Engineer_Remarks, 
                Approver_1_Name, Approver_1_Remarks, Approver_1_Timestamp, Approver_2_Name, 
                Approver_2_Remarks, Approver_2_Timestamp, Created_By, Created_Timestamp, 
                Updated_By, Updated_Timestamp) AS SourceHash
FROM [CP_OLTP].[CP_Area_Config_Master]',
